title: the Storm Reckoning
intro: Thorr is the Paragon of the Kragnok. Wielding the colossal hammer Mornark, he descends upon the battlefield not with speed, but with inevitable power. He bides his time, gathering the static of the atmosphere into a single, world-shaking blow before trapping his enemies in a web of lightning.

abilities.name: Static Accumulator
abilities.details:
When Thorr is not basic attacking, he generates Static charge, reaching maximum capacity over a few seconds.

Thorr's next basic attack uses up all the Static charge and deals bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) based on the current charge amount.

At maximum charge, Thorr gains increased [ms]movement speed[/] and the bonus damage on his next basic attack is doubled.

abilities.name: Thundering Smash
abilities.details:
Thorr throws his hammer to a target direction. Upon impact or at the end of the travel, the hammer releases a shockwave, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all nearby enemies and [db]slowing them[/] for a short duration.

The hammer will stay on the ground, and only returns to Thorr after a certain duration. While disarmed, Thorr's basic attacks deal [db]less damage[/], but Static Accumulator charges faster.

Thorr can also walk over the hammer to pick it up again and [bf]reduce the remaining cooldown[/] of this ability by half.

abilities.name: Lightning Rebuke
abilities.details:
Thorr slams his fists together, creating a resonant boom. For the next few seconds, Thorr gains a shield and any enemy that basic attacks him is struck by a bolt of lightning, taking minor [ap]magical damage[/] and granting Thorr a quarter of his Static charge.

Lightning Rebuke can only be cast while Thorr is disarmed.

abilities.name: Electrical Anchors
abilities.details:
On the first cast, Thorr places an Electrical Anchor at a target location. On the second cast, Thorr places a second Electrical Anchor at another location.

Then, an electrical arc instantly connects the two points, shocking all enemies in between, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly [db]stuning[/] them.

Thorr can place Electrical Anchors while moving.

abilities.name: Gathering Storm
abilities.details:
Thorr raises his hammer, summoning a massive thunderstorm around himself, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] each wave.

Gathering Storm has three waves. The last wave deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly [db]stunning[/] all enemies hit.

Thorr gains increased [ms]movement speed[/] and [bf]damage reduction[/] during Gathering Storm but is unable to basic attack or cast other abilities.
